name: randomorder
description: Generates a random order of members within a server or a specific channel (excluding Bots).

options.name: scope
options.description: Specify the scope of random ordering.

name: teamsof
description: Generates a random pairing of members within a specific server or a specific channel.

options.name: scope
options.description: Specify the scope of random ordering.

options.name: num
options.description: Specify the # of members per team.

options.name: side
options.description: Choose a side of the coin.

name: poll
description: Create a poll with a question and choices.

options.name: question
options.description: Enter the question for the poll.

options.name: choices
options.description: Enter the choices for the poll. (Separated by commas (e.g. Choice 1, Choice 2))

name: help
description: View a list of all commands.
